tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE MusicTherapyArticles (
    article_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255),
    author VARCHAR(255),
    publication_date DATE,
    content TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE research_articles(
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title TEXT,
    author TEXT,
    publication_date DATE,
    content TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE studies(
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    study_name TEXT,
    researcher TEXT,
    study_date DATE,
    findings TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE resources(
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    resource_name TEXT,
    source TEXT,
    link TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE music_therapy_centers(
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    center_name TEXT,
    location TEXT,
    contact_info TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE research_articles (
  article_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  title TEXT,
  author TEXT,
  publication_date DATE,
  keywords TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE studies (
  study_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  study_title TEXT,
  researcher TEXT,
  study_date DATE,
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE resources (
  resource_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  resource_name TEXT,
  resource_type TEXT,
  url TEXT,
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE therapists (
  therapist_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  therapist_name TEXT,
  specialty TEXT,
  location TEXT,
  contact_information TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name TEXT,
  therapist_id INT,
  diagnosis TEXT,
  treatment_plan TEXT
)
